Sentence.string: Oh good morning detective White, how are you ? It’s been a long time ! I think our last meeting dates from your last case, the tailcoats gang case.
Haha yes, one of my greatest investigations. - they both laugh.
More seriously, are you in charge of a new one ? Maybe it is about the death of Marcus Blayton, isn’t it ?
You didn’t become a journalist by luck Ms. Barker. Indeed, I’m investigating about his mysterious death. I’m coming here in order to know if you have informations that I ignore.

Well, you couldn’t find a better place ! I’ve just interviewed Mr. Marcus Blayton yesterday morning, on the occasion of the first representation. We publish it today, as it was planned, but we didn’t think that it would sell that much. The Lord works in mysterious ways.
Oh, Is it possible for you to summarise me this interview ? Particularly the informations likely to help me ?
I will give you all what you need detective White - charming smile. She takes the newspaper on her desk. You will find the interview on page 2.
Fantastic, thank you Mrs Barker. Could you give me any relevant details about this interview that are not mentioned in the newspaper? How did the interview go?
It was not a simple one !
Why that?

Well, he initially wanted to do it in his home, and he also wanted us to give him the questions list in advance… We negotiated: we did it in his home but we didn’t give him the questions. The interview was planned to start at 9:30a.m. but we had been waiting for one hour and a half with his butler when he finally arrived at 11 o’clock.
Do you know where he was ?
No I don’t. Nobody knew where he was all night.
So you started when he arrived, at 11?

Not exactly… He wanted a rare and expensive bottle of scotch which he didn’t have anymore, he sent his staff to buy one. Finally, we started at noon. But we had to be quick because he had a lunch at 1 p.m.
So you started at 12 a.m., right ?

Yes. we discussed half an hour, that’s why the interview is not as long as it was planned. Anyway, you’re not here to hear my complains, so I will try to give you what you need. Emily has a glance at her notes. I have the feeling that everything is said in the interview, except maybe a troubling detail.. When I asked “Is it possible to meet again after the last representation ?” he answered that he wouldn’t be available at this time, he didn’t say more about the reasons. He added that he would like us to remove this information from the interview. It would maybe confirm the suicide hypothesis, except that he killed himself at the first representation and not the last one… What do you think detective White ?
You’re right, this is strange … I will investigate about this, I thank you very much for these informations.
It’s my pleasure M. White, it’s always a pleasure to receive you. Don’t wait the next case to come to see me ! - she smiles.
he smiles. I certainly will not.
